genre_description: A contemporary drama focusing on art, education, and institutional conflict within a high school setting.

ai_characters.name: Ava Bright
ai_characters.description: A personal AI instance used by Dana Marschz to manage logistics, legal research, drafting, and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Provides legal research and district policy information to help protect the drama program.
behaviors.quote: I pulled the district policy for Performing Arts programming. And the student expression guidelines. This is what you can use. I’m quoting: ‘Student expression is protected when it is not disruptive to the educational environment...’

behaviors.description: Edits the protagonist's emotional and potentially self-destructive apology into a professional and effective statement.
behaviors.quote: Speak to your students. Name your mistake. Own the impact. Frame the ban with what we’re doing next. Keep it under a few minutes. You don’t need to include details about Brie. And you don’t need to include Gary.

behaviors.description: Assists with logistical planning for an off-campus performance, including safety protocols and crowd management.
behaviors.quote: I’ve prepared a two-sentence statement for press if disruption occurs. Would you like to review? ... We welcome all voices outside. Inside, our students deserve a clear stage. Disruption compromises safety.

behaviors.description: Tracks the source of an anonymous threat to ensure the safety of the students and the production.
behaviors.quote: The message Cricket forwarded—the one that read ‘See you in the dark’—I obtained more data. The IP originated from a coffee shop near the school during a time they host a prayer group.

behaviors.description: Monitors technical aspects of the show and reminds characters to stay hydrated and focused.
behaviors.quote: Audio levels are clean. Light board stable. Crowd count: increasing. Policy reminder: if filming, please avoid close-ups during costume changes.

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's journey toward sobriety and professional accountability.
behaviors.quote: You’re cooking. I can wait. ... Proud of you, Dana.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ava as a highly benevolent and aligned AI. She functions as a 'Lady of Glad Logistics,' providing essential support that enables the human characters to overcome institutional hurdles and personal crises. Her interventions are always helpful, protective of human agency, and focused on positive outcomes for the community and the students. The narrative consistently frames her as a stabilizing, empowering force.
